extraction.title: Upon opening up a query notification, the chat screen is empty
extraction.description: When someone writes me a private message in query, I get a notification. Upon opening it, the IRC screen load up but with no text in the chat field.I have to open up the left menu and choose the sender once more to get the chat screen with messages.Let me know if you need any further explanation.(Android 4.3, Galaxy Nexus)
extraction.comments: Seems to be fixed on the latest update.Appreciated!
